page.title: 20EDUCATION_THE EDITORS
page.content: Here is a list of all those who took part in compiling the index_ Christian Berriman,Greg Bertenshaw, Oliver Burstow,Jamie Cowling,Mark Harris,John Higgins,Ben Hughes and Richard Noonan. Louise Carmichael,Joanne Commons, Michaela Ettinger,Estelle Fiske, Christine Foreman,Katherine Gray, Donna Gregory,Joanna Higgins,Jenna Homes,Nicola Hunter,Samantha James, Caroline Jones,Helen McLellan,Rebecca Purdie,Helen Rennie,Caroline Thornton, Lisa Dick and Heidi Walford. Teachers involved were Class 3J teacher _Mr. Andrew Chapple and also the County Advisory teacher Miss M. Perryman. All information was gathered in the months of June and July of 1985.
